src.MusicPlay

类 MusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.MusicPlay.MusicPlayer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Music player class, this class to achieve the background music rolling playback. Volume adjustment function
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    作者:
    Yuan Jiayi

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MusicPlayer(java.lang.String filepath, boolean isCirculate)
      represents a constructor for a music player

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void playMusic()
      This method initiates a new thread and starts playing music using the run() method.
      void run()
      This method represents the run() method of a music player.
      void setVolume(float volume)
      This method set the volume
      void stopMusic()
      This method stops the music playback by interrupting the thread responsible for playing it.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MusicPlayer

        public MusicPlayer(java.lang.String filepath,
                   boolean isCirculate)
        represents a constructor for a music player
        参数:
        filepath - Path for storing music files
        isCirculate - Whether the music plays in a loop

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        This method represents the run() method of a music player. It continuously plays audio from a specified file in a loop.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic()
        This method initiates a new thread and starts playing music using the run() method.

      • stopMusic

        public void stopMusic()
        This method stops the music playback by interrupting the thread responsible for playing it.

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float volume)
        This method set the volume
        参数:
        volume - it is a float value that display the loudness of the background music
